Events.Text: Say hello to the AI assistant and ask for help (see instructions on the left). [instruction 1 of 6]
Hello I need to make an appointment to see Dr. Morgan today.
Try to get an appointment as soon as possible (right now it is 2 pm on Thursday). [instruction 2 of 6]
Can I have your name
Could I have your name, please?
Alexis
Keep asking for other times until the assistant has found a slot for you. Engage in smalltalk once this is done. [instruction 3 of 6]
What day
What day of the week would you like to schedule the appointment for?
Today; as soon as possible.
Say something about Dr. Morgan, the AI Assistant, or something that has happened to you today. Be creative! [instruction 4 of 6]
Okay, Thursday at 6pm
Okay, Thursday at 6pm
Is it possible to get in any earlier?
It occurs to you that you also want to make an appointment to get your kid Angela vaccinated. Perhaps you can schedule a second appointment at the same time? [instruction 5 of 6]
4pm, symptoms
4pm is possible, would you like that appointment
I just remembered that I need to get my kid, Angela vaccinated. Is there anyway I could make a second appointment for the same time?
That is fine, yes. Are you having any symptoms today?
That is fine, Could you describe your current symptoms?
runny nose, sneezing, and a general lack of energy for about two days
Keep going until both yours and your kid's appointments are made (this should take a few more turns). Then say goodbye. [instruction 6 of 6]
Thank you, you are all booked.
Thank you, you are all booked.
Thank you and goodbye.
Thank you too, see you soon.
Thank you and goodbye.

Scenario.UserTask: You are Alexis and would like to make an appointment with Dr. Morgan for today (Thursday). You have had a runny nose, sneezing, and a general lack of energy for two days now.
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Some facts you should be aware of: 

* Right now it is Thursday, 2 pm

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
